active_learning.discussion_prompt: Given the 'assume breach' mindset, debate the trade-offs of implementing strict network isolation during software deployment versus maintaining development agility. Reference NIST SP 800-207 Zero Trust Architecture principles (https://csrc.nist.gov/pubs/sp/800/207/final) and provide real-world examples like the SolarWinds breach where lack of isolation enabled lateral movement.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
